breakdowns.description: Allows users to add, edit, delete, and mark events as archived. Events include name, description, and location.
conditions: Event must have name, description, and location when added

breakdowns.description: Enables users to add new tasks with title, description, priority, due date, and tag; edit existing tasks; delete tasks; and mark tasks as completed or pending.
conditions: Task must have title, description, priority, due date, and tag when added
Tasks can be marked as Completed or Pending

breakdowns.description: Allows users to assign multiple tasks to a single event.
conditions: Multiple tasks can be assigned to an event
